PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac Mag/Appended Mag/Flared + FTTC/Triple Tap + HIR [7 mag is higher total damage, 6 mag is higher dps]

7 is the magic number for Triple Tap, but ammo return with 6 ammo is the same as 7. You proc HIR at the same time with 6 vs 7 mag.
PvP: Hammer Forged/Corkscrew/Fluted + Accurized/Seraph + Moving Target/No distract + quickdraw

PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Appended Mag + Threat Detector/Triple Tap + Rampage/Disruption Break/Vorpal

Base mag of 12 (9 + backup mag) = 17 shots with Triple Tap, 13 mag = 19 shots
Extended Mag is a poor choice due to low base reload speed.

PvP: Hammer + Seraph/Accurized + Slideways + Eye of the Storm/HIR/Vorpal/Rampage

Lower range than some of the other 180 offerings (see Nature of the Beast with Rangefinder)
